nodes.text: The Coronet Capitol Tower was the building situated in Coronet City that was home to the leaders of the Corellia government. During the Battle of Corellia around 6 months ABY, Rebel Alliance General Carlist Rieekan was met inside the Tower. The Galactic Empire attacked the city to prevent Crix Madine's defection, forcing the evacuation of the Tower. A shuttle docked on top, along with the Millennium Falcon. Just after the evacuation was finished, two TIE bombers launched their payload of proton bombs on the structure, leveling it.
The Coronet Capitol Tower appears in the 1998 video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron.
